recipe.title: Chow Mien
recipe.step: Heat olive oil in large pan or wok. Cook garlic for a few minutes then add pork. Cook until all brown. Add stock and cabbage then place lid on pan for 10 minutes. Meanwhile cook rice noodle in a separate bowl then drain and chop with kitchen scissors then set aside. Once cabbage cooked add noodles, carrot, stir fry sauce and SandP and stir well. Serve with spring onions sprinkled on top. You can replace the cabbage with any yummy Asian green.
